resources.string: Are You Ready To Level Up?
Are You Up To The Challenge?

The goal of this challenge is to focus on toning your muscles through higher reps at a lower weight. You will begin with 12 dumbbell bicep curls at 60% of your one rep max. Do this for 3 sets with a 1 minute break in between. Next, complete 3 sets of 12 tricep dips with a 1 minute break in between. After that, complete 3 sets of 12 shoulder presses with a 1 minute break in between.

The goal of this challenge is to focus on building muscle mass. ALl exercises should have a 2 minute break between sets. Complete 3 sets of 6 barbell bench presses at 80% of your one rep max. Next, you should complete 3 sets of 6 reps of squats at 80% of your one rep max. After that, you should complete 3 sets of 6 reps of barbell shoulder presses at 80% of your one rep max. Finally, you should complete 3 sets of 6 reps of deadlifts at 80% body weight.

This challenge focuses on cardio training. You will begin with 5 minutes of light running. Then, for 5 minutes you will run at a moderate pace. After that, you will run as hard as you can for 1 minute. Next, you will run at a moderate pace again for 5 minutes. Finally, you will run for 5 minutes at a light pace and end with 2 minutes of walking for a cooldown.

This challenge focuses on body weight exercises. You will begin by doing three sets of push-ups for 30 seconds with a 1 minute break between sets. Then, you will do three sets of squats for 30 seconds with a 1 minute break between sets. After, you will do three sets of sit-ups for 30 seconds with a 1 minute break between sets. Finally, you will finish with 10 minutes on the Stairmaster at no less than 3 speed.
